author: jukka
msg: - Added the o.a.tika.cli.TikaCLI command line class
+ four output formats (xml, html, text, metadata)
+ three input sources (files, URLs, standard input)
- Added simple Unix and DOS start scripts
- Added required packaging and manifest settings

msg: HADOOP-2566. Add globStatus method to the FileSystem interface and deprecate globPath and listPath.(Hairong Kuang via hairong)
